Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel: Influenza A/B Typing Kit
Influenza B Lineage Genotyping Kit (VER 1.1 and VER 2)
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel and associated kits for qualitative detection and characterization of influenza A and B viruses and subtypes using real-time RT-PCR on multiple instrument platforms
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection and characterization of influenza A and B virus RNA, subtyping of influenza A, and genetic lineage typing of influenza B from human respiratory specimens and viral culture to aid clinical diagnosis and support epidemiological surveillance
